quotes.text: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: What we know is a drop, what we do not know is an ocean.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest step of your life.
quotes.author: Naeem Callaway

quotes.text: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese proverb

quotes.text: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
